Room.Name: Toby's Iron Works
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Toby the hobbit's iron working shop.
Room.LongDescription: Although Toby has retired, he still likes to earn the occasional gold piece by repairing armor and weapons. Mostly he spends his time making a few custom made weapons for some of the nobility at Prince Rutger's castle. His half-wit brother has a shop and home next door where he sells a few of the things he makes.
